scripts.cdk:synth: cdk synth --app 'npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json bin/app.ts' ProtoBearerStack
scripts.cdk:diff: cdk diff --app 'npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json bin/app.ts' ProtoBearerStack
scripts.cdk:deploy: cdk deploy --app 'npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json bin/app.ts' ProtoBearerStack
